danfulea.phys

Class HvlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • danfulea.phys.HvlUtil
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class HvlUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class computes HVL from experimental data. Redundant methods since all you need is really a single function mmAl = f(Exposure) and compute mmAl for HVL (Exposure0/2). This function can be either a polynomial or better a spline function. Therefore, this class is deprecated.
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 2006
